Author: Birdie49
Text: I feel the exact same way :( I'm trying to gain a bit just so my bones don't dissolve but I'm dreading having everyone see my body and... ugh. I just wanna wear nothing but big sweatshirts and sweatpants and... scratch that, I'm just gonna wear a giant blanket over my head like a fucking ghost so no one can see me ever again

Author: CepheidVox
Text: it seems fat and ugly to you, but it is widely considered beautiful by other people. Saying that, I know how you feel.
